014package org.jdbi.v3.guice.internal;
015
016import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
017import java.lang.reflect.Type;
018import java.util.Map;
019import java.util.Objects;
020import java.util.Set;
021import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
022
023import com.google.inject.Key;
024import com.google.inject.PrivateModule;
025import com.google.inject.Scopes;
026import com.google.inject.TypeLiteral;
027import org.jdbi.v3.core.codec.Codec;
028import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.ColumnMapper;
029import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.RowMapper;
030import org.jdbi.v3.core.qualifier.QualifiedType;
031import org.jdbi.v3.core.spi.JdbiPlugin;
032import org.jdbi.v3.guice.GuiceJdbiCustomizer;
033
034import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkNotNull;
035
036public final class InternalGlobalJdbiModule extends PrivateModule {
037
038    private static final TypeLiteral<Set<RowMapper<?>>> ROW_MAPPER_TYPE_LITERAL = new TypeLiteral<Set<RowMapper<?>>>() {};
039    private static final TypeLiteral<Map<Type, RowMapper<?>>> QUALIFIED_ROW_MAPPER_TYPE_LITERAL = new TypeLiteral<Map<Type, RowMapper<?>>>() {};
040    private static final TypeLiteral<Set<ColumnMapper<?>>> COLUMN_MAPPER_TYPE_LITERAL = new TypeLiteral<Set<ColumnMapper<?>>>() {};
041    private static final TypeLiteral<Map<QualifiedType<?>, ColumnMapper<?>>> QUALIFIED_COLUMN_MAPPER_TYPE_LITERAL = new TypeLiteral<Map<QualifiedType<?>, ColumnMapper<?>>>() {};
042    private static final TypeLiteral<Set<GuiceJdbiCustomizer>> CUSTOMIZER_TYPE_LITERAL = new TypeLiteral<Set<GuiceJdbiCustomizer>>() {};
043    private static final TypeLiteral<Map<Class<?>, String>> ARRAY_TYPES_TYPE_LITERAL = new TypeLiteral<Map<Class<?>, String>>() {};
044    private static final TypeLiteral<Set<JdbiPlugin>> PLUGINS_TYPE_LITERAL = new TypeLiteral<Set<JdbiPlugin>>() {};
045    private static final TypeLiteral<Map<QualifiedType<?>, Codec<?>>> CODECS_TYPE_LITERAL = new TypeLiteral<Map<QualifiedType<?>, Codec<?>>>() {};
046
047    private static final ConcurrentHashMap<Class<? extends Annotation>, InternalGlobalJdbiModule> REGISTRY = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
048
049    private final Class<? extends Annotation> annotation;
050
051    public static InternalGlobalJdbiModule forAnnotation(Class<? extends Annotation> annotation) {
052        checkNotNull(annotation, "annotation is null");
053        return REGISTRY.computeIfAbsent(annotation, InternalGlobalJdbiModule::new);
054    }
055
056    private InternalGlobalJdbiModule(Class<? extends Annotation> annotation) {
057        this.annotation = checkNotNull(annotation, "annotation is null");
058    }
059
060    @Override
061    public void configure() {
062
063        // these bindings exist because this module is called from AbstractJdbiConfigurationModule which instantiates
064        // an InternalJdbiBinder that defines all the multibindings with the same annotation as this module.
065        // So when guice tries to resolve the following bindings, all of them exist because they just have been defined
066        binder().bind(ROW_MAPPER_TYPE_LITERAL).to(Key.get(ROW_MAPPER_TYPE_LITERAL, annotation));
067        binder().bind(QUALIFIED_ROW_MAPPER_TYPE_LITERAL).to(Key.get(QUALIFIED_ROW_MAPPER_TYPE_LITERAL, annotation));
068        binder().bind(COLUMN_MAPPER_TYPE_LITERAL).to(Key.get(COLUMN_MAPPER_TYPE_LITERAL, annotation));
069        binder().bind(QUALIFIED_COLUMN_MAPPER_TYPE_LITERAL).to(Key.get(QUALIFIED_COLUMN_MAPPER_TYPE_LITERAL, annotation));
070        binder().bind(CUSTOMIZER_TYPE_LITERAL).to(Key.get(CUSTOMIZER_TYPE_LITERAL, annotation));
071        binder().bind(PLUGINS_TYPE_LITERAL).to(Key.get(PLUGINS_TYPE_LITERAL, annotation));
072        binder().bind(ARRAY_TYPES_TYPE_LITERAL).to(Key.get(ARRAY_TYPES_TYPE_LITERAL, annotation));
073        binder().bind(CODECS_TYPE_LITERAL).to(Key.get(CODECS_TYPE_LITERAL, annotation));
074
075        // the previous binding statements bring the annotated bindings into the private module space without annotation
076        // so that the InternalGuiceJdbiCustomizer can pick them up without a required annotation. Then in turn the created
077        // customizer is exposed back out to the global binding namespace with the annotation passed in on the constructor.
078        binder().bind(GuiceJdbiCustomizer.class).annotatedWith(annotation).to(InternalGuiceJdbiCustomizer.class).in(Scopes.SINGLETON);
079        expose(Key.get(GuiceJdbiCustomizer.class, annotation));
080    }
081
082    @Override
083    public boolean equals(Object o) {
084        if (this == o) {
085            return true;
086        }
087        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) {
088            return false;
089        }
090        InternalGlobalJdbiModule that = (InternalGlobalJdbiModule) o;
091        return annotation.equals(that.annotation);
092    }
093
094    @Override
095    public int hashCode() {
096        return Objects.hash(annotation);
097    }
098}
